input.sentences: the cemetery where the burial took place .
the new grave site of a person recently buried .
a group of mourners talk outside after the service .
a bit of refreshment for the mourners after the dedication .
the cleric who preformed the service .
output.sentences: This was it, the graveyard my grandfather had finally been laid to rest in.
I stood over his plot thinking on the all the wonderful times we had as I was growing up.
Being surrounded by family made the burden of losing my grandfather easier.
I step back into the funeral home and greeted the rest of my older family members. My mom called me over to give me something.
My mom handed me a picture of my grandfather in his younger days. She wanted me to keep it in his memory. I thanked her and tucked the picture in my back pilot before consoling my mother.
